snippet: François Hollande is facing rising discontent as he prepares to assemble the package of tax increases and spending cuts required to reduce the deficit.
abstract: French Pres Francois Hollande, as a Socialist president who ran a campaign that opposed austerity, faces rising discontent as he prepares to assemble package of tax increases and spending cuts required to reduce the deficit.
lead_paragraph: François Hollande is facing rising discontent as he prepares to assemble the package of tax increases and spending cuts required to reduce the deficit.

headline.seo: French President François Hollande Must Cut Deficit, but How?
headline.main: French President Must Cut Deficit, but How?
headline.print_headline: Rising Anxieties as France Prepares for Budget Cuts
